## Vermont Data Analysis

## Read Excel Sheet (Age Data)

```{r}
install.packages("readxl")
library(readxl)
data <- read_excel("Age_Data_Vermont_2020.xlsx")

```

```{r}
colnames(data)

```

```{r}

mean_age <- weighted.mean(data$Age, w = data$Population)
mean_age

```
